API Keys∵

An APIKey resource represents the API key secret used to perform authenticated requests with the Balanced API.

Create an API Key∵

Create a new API key.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/api_keys

Balanced::ApiKey.new

balanced.APIKey()

balanced.api_key.create()

ApiKey(Map<String, Object> payload)

Balanced\APIKey()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/api_keys \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X POST

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

key = Balanced::ApiKey.new.save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

api_key = balanced.APIKey().save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.api_key.create()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

ApiKey key = new ApiKey();
try {
    key.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$key = new Balanced\APIKey();
$key->save();

?>

Example Response

{
    "api_keys": [
        {
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:11:50.286628Z", 
            "href": "/api_keys/AK3VllCSnVVb5o6vyiNWtJ7E", 
            "id": "AK3VllCSnVVb5o6vyiNWtJ7E", 
            "links": {}, 
            "meta": {}, 
            "secret": "ak-test-2bfUqtKjkJGC9Nyzn4WxT48LqJQUWOulz"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {}
}

Fetch an API Key∵

Get an existing API key.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/api_keys/:api_key_id

Balanced::ApiKey.fetch

balanced.APIKey.fetch()

balanced.get

ApiKey(String uri)

Balanced\APIKey::get()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/api_keys/AK3VllCSnVVb5o6vyiNWtJ7E \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card = Balanced::ApiKey.fetch('/api_keys/AK6vYazRHYGP5Tiqeuo9kMUq')

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

key = balanced.APIKey.fetch('/api_keys/AK4Vt1mJyCtjdSiGgqAebarR')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/api_keys/AK3VllCSnVVb5o6vyiNWtJ7E')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

ApiKey apiKey = new ApiKey("/api_keys/AK3zUFsQ8aJ3aae9ZylavXLp");

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

Balanced\APIKey::get("/api_keys/AK2BVfJvQoxinxsgjqoinQWH")

?>

Example Response

{
    "api_keys": [
        {
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:11:50.286628Z", 
            "href": "/api_keys/AK3VllCSnVVb5o6vyiNWtJ7E", 
            "id": "AK3VllCSnVVb5o6vyiNWtJ7E", 
            "links": {}, 
            "meta": {}
        }
    ], 
    "links": {}
}

List all API Keys∵

List all API keys for the marketplace.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/api_keys

Balanced::ApiKey.all

balanced.APIKey.query

balanced.api_key.query

ApiKey.Collection(String uri)

Balanced\APIKey->query()->all()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/api_keys \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card = Balanced::ApiKey.all

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

keys = balanced.APIKey.query

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.api_key.query

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

ApiKey.Collection apiKeys = new ApiKey.Collection(ApiKey.resource_href);

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

Balanced\APIKey->query()->all();

?>

Example Response

{
    "api_keys": [
        {
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:11:50.286628Z", 
            "href": "/api_keys/AK3VllCSnVVb5o6vyiNWtJ7E", 
            "id": "AK3VllCSnVVb5o6vyiNWtJ7E", 
            "links": {}, 
            "meta": {}
        }, 
        {
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:11:44.741479Z", 
            "href": "/api_keys/AK3P6Leemt0eV7Mm7z4LXIpW", 
            "id": "AK3P6Leemt0eV7Mm7z4LXIpW", 
            "links": {}, 
            "meta": {}, 
            "secret": "ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {}, 
    "meta": {
        "first": "/api_keys?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "href": "/api_keys?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "last": "/api_keys?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "limit": 10, 
        "next": null, 
        "offset": 0, 
        "previous": null, 
        "total": 2
    }
}

Delete an API Key∵

Delete an API key.

Definition

DELETE https://api.balancedpayments.com/api_keys/:api_key_id

Balanced::ApiKey.unstore

balanced.APIKey().delete()

balanced.get().unstore();

ApiKey().unstore()

Balanced\APIKey->unstore();

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/api_keys/AK3VllCSnVVb5o6vyiNWtJ7E \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X DELETE

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

key = Balanced::ApiKey.fetch('/api_keys/AK6vYazRHYGP5Tiqeuo9kMUq')
key.unstore

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

key = balanced.APIKey.fetch('/api_keys/AK4Vt1mJyCtjdSiGgqAebarR')
key.delete()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/api_keys/AK3VllCSnVVb5o6vyiNWtJ7E').unstore()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

ApiKey key = new ApiKey("/api_keys/AK3zUFsQ8aJ3aae9ZylavXLp");
try {
    key.unstore();
}
catch (APIError e) {}
catch (NotCreated notCreated) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$api_key = Balanced\APIKey::get("/api_keys/AK2BVfJvQoxinxsgjqoinQWH");
$api_key->unstore();

?>
